text.p: At Derby: Derbyshire beat Yorkshire by 114 runs. Derbyshire
259-2 innings closed (C.Adams 109 not out, V.Clarke 77 not out).
At Chester-le-Street: Warwickshire beat Durham by five
wickets. Durham 174-2 innings closed (M.Speight 64 not out,
At Southampton: Hampshire beat Worcestershire by 87 runs.
Hampshire 232-4 innings closed (M.Keech 53 not out, S.Udal 52
At Trent Bridge: Somerset beat Nottinghamshire by 30 runs.
Somerset 227-6 innings closed (M.Burns 60, K. Parsons 52 not
At Hove: Sussex beat Gloucestershire by one wicket.
